articles.title: Mary Holm: A home of your own - who really needs it? - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: Yes, you can plan to keep on renting -- just be sure to save plenty for retirement.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sid Lowe
articles.title: Simeone will be remembered for reviving the Madrid derby - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: After 11 years, Diego Simeone's time in charge of Atletico seems close to ending, and among his greatest legacies will be reviving the Madrid derby.
articles.content:
Could Saturday be Diego Simeone's last Madrid derby as Atletico manager? Berengui/DeFodi Images via Getty Images
